LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_UseSounds_Desc: Play sounds on various triggers, such as enabling/disabling work or displaying messages.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_ShowPrompt_Desc: When using Disable/Reset Work buttons, open an 'Are you sure?' dialogue window.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_VerboseMessages_Desc: Display various messages such as "Jenny has been assigned to Cook".
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_Tooltip_WorkButton: Work Functions\n\nClick: open the functions menu.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_Tooltip_Primary:
Shift-click: adjust priority for everyone.

Ctrl-click: enable or disable for everyone.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_Tooltip_DraggableWork:
Click & drag: adjust priority.
\Ctrl-click: enable or disable.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_Tooltip_IncapacitatedWorker: <color=red>\n\nNAME is unable to do {0} work because of HIS health condition.</color>
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_Message_IncapablePawn: Cannot assign NAME to {0}. HECAP is incapable of doing it.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_Message_DraggedIncapableWork: Tried to adjust {0}. Will have no effect because NAME is incapable of doing it.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_Message_PastedPriorities: Adjusted NAME's work priorities according to {0}'s.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_Message_NoCopyPasteReference: There are no priorities in memory. Copy priorities first.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_Message_PrimaryShiftClick: {0} has been adjusted for all colonists on this map.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_PromptText_AllPawns_EnableWor: All work will be enabled for <color=red>every colonist on this map</color>.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_PromptText_AllPawns_DisableWo: All work will be disabled for <color=red>every colonist on this map</color>.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_PromptText_AllPawns_ResetWork: All work will be reset for <color=red>every colonist on this map</color>.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_PromptText_EnableWork: All possible work for NAME will be enabled.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_PromptText_DisableWork: All active work for NAME will be disabled.\n\nNAME will become idle if you don't assign new work for HIM.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_PromptText_ResetWork: All possible work for NAME will be enabled and sorted by natural priority.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_PromptText_DisablePrompt: \n\nIf you disable prompts, you can re-enable them in Options -> Mod Settings.
